thread.title: David & Victoria Beckham Share Adorable Family Photos From Ski Trip
thread.title_full: David & Victoria Beckham Share Adorable Family Photos From Ski Trip

author: Just Jared
title: David & Victoria Beckham Share Adorable Family Photos From Ski Trip
text:
The Beckhams have been getting in some quality time together while on a snowy family vacation! 
David and Victoria were joined by their children ‚Äì five-year-old Harper , 14-year-old Romeo , 11-year-old Cruz and 17-year-old Brooklyn , for a ski trip in Whistler, Canada. 
It looks like the family has been having a ton of fun, sharing lots of photos on social media. David is even learning to snowboard!
‚ÄúDon‚Äôt usually post so many but it‚Äôs so beautiful up here plus having a special time so before anyone else sells pictures of the family I wanted you guys to see them first . Btw my first time ever boarding or even on the slopes üíú,‚Äù David wrote on his Instagram .
The family did face a minor setback when Brooklyn took a tumble on the slopes and broke his collarbone! 
‚ÄúJust before his accident ‚Ä¶ Brave boy xx sorry ( man ),‚Äù David wrote along with a photo of Brooklyn . 
10+ pictures inside from the Beckham family vacation‚Ä¶
